page.title: 04BURNHAM POLICE STATION
page.content: On 6th June we walked up to {Burnham {Police Station}.When we arrived we were taken upstairs,and we found a PC watching TV.We were taken back downstairs to {PC Bennets office}.We asked him questions.Leighton said"What do you do in your spare time"?He answered sailing.Clair asked the next question and it was" what car do you drive"?The answer uas "I drive a Ford Escort".Jennifer asked the next question and it was" what part of Maidenhead do you live in?" The answer was{" Cox Green"}.I went next and I asked "Have you been in a frightening situation"?He said "I have been,at a football match". GNIPLEH05760198
